thread.title: Referee Agbovi to handle Congo, Central Africa Republic CHAN qualifier
thread.title_full: Referee Agbovi to handle Congo, Central Africa Republic CHAN qualifier

title: Referee Agbovi to handle Congo, Central Africa Republic CHAN qualifier
text:
Sports News | 9 October 2015 23:00 CET Referee Agbovi to handle Congo, Central Africa Republic CHAN qualifier By GNA 
Accra, Oct. 9, GNA - Referee William Selorm Agbovi, has been selected by the Confederation of Africa Football (CAF) to handle the Championship of African Nations (CHAN), Cup qualifying match between DR Congo and Central Africa Republic in Kinshasha, DR Congo. 
According to CAF, Referee Agbovi will be assisted by Dawood Brimah Yamdogo Ouedrago and David Nelson Agyin with Daniel Nii Ayi Laryea as the fourth referee, with Marcel Njipendi Kuotu from Cameroon as the Match Commissioner for the match. 
The match, according to CAF will be played between October 16-18 in Kinshasha DR Congo. 
GNA
